pageProduct.name: Optrex Eye Drops for Red or Sore Eyes 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Optrex Eye Drops clears the redness, relieves sore eyes.

For the relief of minor eye irritations. Red inflamed eyes. Sore, irritated eyes. Congested eyes. Itchy eyes. Gritty eyes.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

Pharmacy medicine.
Keep out of reach of children.

lf symptoms persist, see your doctor or pharmacist.
Not for use in children under 12 years. Do not use if you have glaucoma or other serious eye conditions. May interact with other topically applied autonomic drugs e.g, those used in tie treatment of glaucoma. Consult a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are using other eye products or you have heart problems. Prolonged use may be harmful. Use of naphazoline in the eye may liberate pigment granules from the iris, especially when given in high doses to elderly patients. Do not use if bottle seal is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Naphazoline hydrochloride 0.1mg/mL.
Also contains Benzalkonium Chloride 0.05mg/mL as a preservative.

Directions

Directions for adults and children over 12 years:
- Tilt head back.
- Gently squeeze 1 or 2 drops into the corner of each eye.
- Take care not to touch the eye with the tip of the dropper.
- Repeat up to 3 times daily.

USAGE ADVICE

Contents are sterile if seal is intact.
Not suitable for use with hydrophilic (soft) contact lenses.
Discard contents one month after opening.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
